text: - My name is Calvin Li.

I have been working within
AWS for almost four years.
And I'm a software development engineer.

I started the programming
life since my primary school
and started building blogs,

simple program to make the
cars move, things like that.
And I found that interesting

learning about algorithms,
data structures.
I work in the IoT device ecosystem team.

The mission of our team is
to build a secure, reliable
and sustainable device ecosystem.
The best part I like about AWS
is there's no other places like AWS
where you have the opportunities to work

with plenty of great
companies in the world.

You get to know about
their brilliant ideas

on how to create values
for their customers.

And then you can work with them
together to accomplish that
by using the AWS solutions.

We encourage challenging
people in the team,
especially in the design reviews.

It's good for both the presenter
and the other teammates.
For presenter, if you get to challenge it,
then you think about your designs.
And when challenging people,
you get to know better about their designs
and then you can bring some more ideas

and people can reinvent
and create new stuff.
My favorite leadership principle is
has backbone, disagree and compete.
(upbeat music)
